comment: This is an example of how to add the Memory Match step to your lesson JSON in Supabase
instruction: Add this step before the completion step in your lesson's content.steps array

memory_match_step.title: Vocabulary Memory Match
memory_match_step.content: Test your memory by matching English football positions with their Portuguese translations!

notes: The vocabulary array should have at least 8 items for the 3x3 grid and 16 items for the 4x4 grid
Each vocabulary item needs an 'id', 'english', and either 'translation' or 'portuguese' field
The game will randomly select items from the vocabulary array each time it's played
Players can choose between 3x3 (8 cards) or 4x4 (16 cards) grid sizes
XP is awarded based on performance (fewer attempts = more XP)
example_integration: To add this to your existing lesson, insert the memory_match_step object into your steps array at position 7 (or wherever you want it, but before the completion step)
